info.name: Project API
info.description:
Rote API - A note-taking and sharing platform API built with Hono framework.

Base URL: {{base_url}}/v2/api

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication via Bearer token in the Authorization header.

## Response Format
All responses follow the format:
```json
{
  "code": 0,
  "message": "Success",
  "data": {...}
}
```
